title: 2019 Predictions: Calibration Results
summary:
Key ideas:
- The author has been making annual predictions since 2014 and scores them at the end of the year.
- The author shares their predictions for 2019 and evaluates their accuracy.
- The predictions cover a wide range of topics, including politics, economics, technology, world affairs, personal life, and more.
- The author provides a calibration chart to evaluate their confidence and accuracy in their predictions.

Key learnings:
- The author's predictions for 2019 were generally accurate, with an average calibration of 83%.
- The author was slightly underconfident in their predictions.
- Some predictions were difficult to evaluate due to being private or subjective.

Key questions:
- Did the author make predictions for 2020?
- How will the author adjust their confidence level in future predictions?
- How did the author come up with their predictions for each category?
